exec: tests["Body contains list of services"] = serviceData;

tests["Body contains added passive checks enabled"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("service_passive_check_enabled") == serviceData[i]['passive checks enabled'];

tests["Body contains added macro_value"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("service_macro_value") == macroData[i]['macro value'];
